A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: By reducing to ashes all that SW had been building for the last 40 years\, Rian Johnson and Kathleen Kennedy proved to be disloyal and untrustworthy egomaniacs. TLJ is definitively NOT a SW movie. It's just a bad and silly joke\, and the plot has no logic whatsoever. Both the characters and the story have become meaningless\, and the movie goes to nowhere.
